title: Ancient Scientific Methods
text: The most widely known astronomical sites in the world are the observatories of Maharaja sawai jai singh (1688-1743) of india . John Flamsteed published  his  calibrated catalog of stars with unprecendented accuracy of + 10 of arc.micrometer and crosswire fitted telescopes were a common sight in observatories.      Jai singh, unware of devolopments in Europe. erected naked eye instuments of masonary and stone,in the tradition of medieval astronomers such as Ulugh Beg.
